name: Pea And Ginger Soup
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons peeled and roughly chopped ginger, or more to taste, up to 1/4 cup
4 cups chicken or other stock, or water

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan, and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to a simmer, and cook until peas and ginger are very tender, about 15 minutes. Cool at least a few minutes.
Pour soup into a blender, in batches if necessary, and carefully purée. Return to pan, and, over medium-low heat, reheat gently, stirring occasionally. When soup is hot, adjust seasoning, and serve.
